scripts.start: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=MySQL Docker=false MSSQL=false node src/main.js
scripts.azure: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=MySQL Docker=false MSSQL=true node src/main.js
scripts.start1: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=both Docker=false MSSQL=false node src/main.js
scripts.startTest: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=false DATABASE=MySQL NOT_LOGGING=true MSSQL=false npx jest --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.startTest_mssql: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=false DATABASE=MySQL MSSQL=true NOT_LOGGING=true npx jest --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.startTestBackend: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=false DATABASE=MySQL MSSQL=false node src/main.js
scripts.startTestBackend_mssql: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=false DATABASE=MySQL MSSQL=true  node src/main.js
scripts.docker: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=MySQL Docker=true node src/main.js
scripts.mssql: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=MySQL Docker=false MSSQL=true node src/main.js
scripts.docker_azure: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=MySQL Docker=true MSSQL=true node main.js
scripts.local_mssql: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DATABASE=MySQL Docker=false MSSQL=true node src/main.js
scripts.documentation: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DOCUMENTATION=true DATABASE=MySQL node src/main.js
scripts.documentation_mssql: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=true DOCUMENTATION=true DATABASE=MySQL MSSQL=true node src/main.js
scripts.documentation_test: cross-env DEPLOYMENT=false DOCUMENTATION=true DATABASE=MySQL node src/main.js
scripts.docker_azure_documentation: cross-env DOCKER_AZURE=true DEPLOYMENT=true DOCUMENTATION=true DATABASE=MySQL MSSQL=true node main.js
